alert.note: Alert for Hood Canal Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:37PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kitsap and northeastern Mason Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 537 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seabeck, or 8 miles northwest of Belfair. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seabeck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
